newsitem.title: USA: U.S. male nanny pleads guilty to sex charges.
newsitem.headline: U.S. male nanny pleads guilty to sex charges.

text.p: A 24-year-old man pleaded guilty Wednesday to federal charges of travelling interstate with intent to engage in sexual acts with a boy he had been hired to care for as a nanny.
Patrick Slater of Connecticut pleaded guilty to a two-count felony in White Plains federal court and admitted he had engaged in sexual acts on more than one occassion with the 11-year-old child.
Slater had been on probation at the time of the offences for a Connecticut state conviction for having sexual activity with a minor.
Slater had been hired to care for the child in Armonk, New York betweeen April 1995 and June 1996.
Earlier Wednesday, Slater also pleaded guilty to state charges of using a child in a sexual performance and sodomy in the second degree.
Slater faces a maximum sentence of 20 years in prison and $500,000 fine on the federal charges and an indeterminate sentence of seven and a third to 20 years in prison on the state charges.
